HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: E bolokiloeng, e sirelelitsoe le Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Re netefatsa tsireletso e tiileng ea boitsebahatso ba hau bo sa bonahaleng. Tlhahisoleseding eohle e patoa ka lehlakoreng la moreki. Ha re tsebe aterese ea IP, seo o se arolang, kapa le mehlolo eo o e arolang le bona - le ho bohlokoa, litaba.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: O le mong feela ea tsebang sehokelo sa ts'ireletso seo u se thehang le bao u ba arolang le bona. Ha u etsa sekhahla, u ka eketsa phasefo pele e ka buleha. Hape ho ka etsoa hore nako ea poof e be. Le fa e le efe, sekhahla se tla hlakoloa ka mor'a matsatsi a 14.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Link le litaba tsohle li hashed ka lehlakoreng la moreki, ho bolelang hore le rona ha re tsebe sehokelo le litaba. Link e 'ngoe le e' ngoe e na le ID e ikhethang ea bolelele ba 36 e le e le letho e le ho khona ho fumana Mesebetsi ea Sekhahla le litaba tse patiloeng ka AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Ngola molaetsa oa hau le/ kapa theha phasefo
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_1: Ngola le ho romella molaetsa, e tla
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_2: hlakoloa ha e se e baloa.
HOME.SHARE_BULLET_3: E ka baloa nako e le 'ngoe
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: E patiloeng, e sirelelitsoe le Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Ngola molaetsa oa Sekhahla, phasefo kapa boitsebahatso bo amanang *

VIEW.WELCOME_MESSAGE: Lumela, u amohetse molaetsa oa sekhahla!
VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Ngola le ho romella molaetsa, e tla hlakoloa ha e se e baloa.
VIEW.SHOW_MESSAGE_ONCE: Molaetsa o latelang o tla bontšoa hang feela
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Download Stellar Secret mohapheto, theha mehlolo ea hau ea sekhahla
VIEW.ONE_TIME_VIEWABLE: E ka baloa nako e le 'ngoe
